title: RRR effect on demand deposits and total reserves

content.prompt: Assume that a central bank operating in a banking system with limited reserves decreases its required reserve ratio. As a result, demand deposits and total reserves will most likely change in which of the following ways after all adjustments take place in the banking system and assuming banks lend out all excess reserves?

choices.label: Demand deposits will increase, and total reserves will increase.
Demand deposits will increase, and total reserves will not change.
Demand deposits will not change, and total reserves will increase.
Demand deposits will decrease, and total reserves will not change.
Demand deposits will decrease, and total reserves will increase.

topic.text: 4.4: Banking and the Expansion of the Money Supply
